settings.name: port
settings.description: The port for the control api to listen on

output.name: columnNames
output.description: The array of column names if getColumnNames was enabled

output.name: data
output.description: The data that is being emitted from the CSV (either a row or the entire set)

settings.name: filePath
settings.description: Path to a CSV file (local file path or url)

settings.name: emitDelay
settings.description: The delay between data emission in milliseconds, the default is 100ms (min is 10ms)

settings.name: dataAsMap
settings.description: Convert the data to a Map, with column names as keys

settings.name: replayData
settings.description: Convert the data to a Map, with column names as keys

settings.name: allDataAtOnce
settings.description: Indicates that the data be sent all at once, otherwise one row at a time
